summary: Provides a cross‑platform implementation of a named temporary file that can be reopened within the same process. On most systems it delegates to Python’s standard tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile, while on Windows it supplies a custom class that avoids the O_TEMPORARY flag limitation.
business_intent: Enable Django’s file handling utilities to work reliably on all operating systems, especially Windows, by offering a temporary file object that can be opened multiple times during a request or operation, supporting features like file uploads and intermediate storage.
